body:
Hello People I would like too announce that all of us are now gone.

I just wanted too say that we all had our troubles with the server [I hacked, Cezbla was a udder shit Fezbla advertised and Sezbla hacked] We all played for a while before leaving so I just wanted too say bye too some people. 



SOME OF THESE MESSAGES ARE FROM CEZBLA.


-Cezbla, TheMasterCow: You always believed in me and thought I could change, I admire how much you trusted me and I let you all down, but I let you mostly down. I hope we can still be friends later on in the future if not, I hope you have a great life. Don't forget me :D 

-Rezbla, DaBaeMC: This is simple You are the best.




-Cezbla, StanMPL: FOR BEING THE GOD OF AVICUS.




-Cezbla, Zin[Something forgot your name you build aton of maps and stuff]: I always said you were Rude stupid but the truth is you aren't I just wanted too say you make good maps even though I don't like them some people do. 

Bye guys -Ezbla's

title: The Ezbla's

Anyways, goodbye.

Apology accepted. But its not good to be a rude person.

If you act like this IRL, then you will not get anywhere. Just do what you guys can to better yourselves.

replies.body:
Fezbla is still here, as this was a group leave I'm going to lock it for being false. If you state you're all gone, then don't say that you are when said person still plays.

As for Cezbla, as much as I want to forgive you, I can't. I had faith to restore your personality and put you on the right track, through emotional and economical support ranging from the general words I tried to put forward and a Minecraft account to contribute. Then, I was repaid with a lash out due to consequences not being accepted and generally, even though I tried to help you, it hurt and showed that the bad outweighed the good. You can keep using the account. I'm not motivated to speak to you anytime soon even if you take initiative. Hopefully you understand.
